# Class EdgeConditionExecutor

EdgeConditionExecutor class for implementing conditional edge logic. Allows edges to be traversed only when specific conditions are met.

##### Index

### Constructors

constructor

### Methods

destroy getExternal

## Constructors

### constructor

  * new EdgeConditionExecutor(  
condition: [EdgeConditionCallback](/types/graph_edge_condition_executor.EdgeConditionCallback),  
): [EdgeConditionExecutor]()

Creates a new EdgeConditionExecutor with a condition callback.

#### Parameters

    * condition: [EdgeConditionCallback](/types/graph_edge_condition_executor.EdgeConditionCallback)

Function that determines if the edge should be traversed

#### Returns [EdgeConditionExecutor]()

Gets the external reference for use with C++ bindings.
